original_text: So the bad spirits came out of the man and they went into the pigs. All the pigs rushed together down the hill into the lake. They all died there in the water.
korean_text: 귀신들이 그 사람에게서 나와 돼지에게로 들어가니 그 떼가 비탈로 내리달아 호수에 들어가 몰사하거늘

sentences.original_text: So the bad spirits came out of the man
and they went into the pigs
down the hill into the lake
They all died there in the water
